alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:20PM EDT until July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 319 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Luna Pier to 7 miles northeast of Genoa to Gibsonburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. Another line of severe thunderstorms is approaching from the west. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Northwood, Oak Harbor, Genoa, Elmore, Catawba Island, Millbury, Marblehead, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center and Williston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
